鴗鴗鴗

鴗字的基本解释

鴗
lì
翠鸟的别称：山鴗。斑鴗。

鴗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》力入切，入緝，來。］
鸟名。鱼狗。俗称天狗。体小，嘴长，尾短。羽多翠色，可供嵌镶饰品用。主食鱼虾。

鴗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鴗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1485第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?力入切，音立。【爾雅·釋鳥】鴗，天狗。【郭註】小鳥也。靑似翠，喙紅，項下白，食魚。江東呼爲水狗。亦名翠孥。【本草】名魚師。【爾雅翼】謂之魚狗。又名魚虎。【正字通】又名翠碧鳥。與翡翠鳥別。陸龜蒙詩：紅襟翠翰兩參差，徑拂烟華上細枝。春水漸生魚易得，不辭風雨坐多時。崔德符《通羊驛》詩：翠裘錦帽初相識，魚虎彎環掠岸飛。?指鴗言。

鴗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鴗字的起名意思

暂无。

Kai
Basic explanation of words
Kai
lì
Another name for kingfisher: Shanku. Baccarat.
Kai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Guangyun" forcefully cuts, enters, come. ]
The name of the bird. Fish dog. Commonly known as Tengu. Small body, long mouth and short tail. Feathers are multi-green, suitable for inlaid ornaments. Staple fish and shrimp.
Kai
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鴗; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1485 Page 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Power into the cut, sound standing. 【Erya·Shiniao】Kai, tengu. [Guo's Note] The bird is also. The beak is red and the neck is white, and it eats fish. Jiang Dong called a water dog. Also named Cui Sun. 【Materia Medica】Famous fish master. 【Erya wing】It is called the fish and dog. Also known as Yuhu. 【Zhengzitong】Also known as Jade Bird. Farewell to the Emerald Bird. Lu Guimeng Poems: The red-breasted Cuihan are two different ones, and the twigs are brushed with smoke. In the spring water, raw fish is easy to get, and he sits for a long time without hesitation. Cui Defu's poem "Tongyang Post": I met Cuiqiu and brocade hat for the first time, and fish and tigers flew around the bank. ? Refers to Kai Yan.
